job.title: Vice President, External Relationship Manager
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services
job.description: DescriptionAbout this roleThe Financial Institutions Group (FIG) is responsible for developing and maintaining relationships with BlackRock's global financial institutions clients which include insurance companies, banks, and other financial firms. We pride ourselves on creating and delivering bespoke investment solutions, advisory, and analysis to our sophisticated client base. The group is one of the industry's largest managers of insurance company assets, and our insurance practice is a strategic focus of the firm.As part of the FIG team, you will work as part of a team of client-facing relationship management professionals with a deep understanding of industry trends, client needs, and BlackRock's capabilities across investment management, risk, and advisory. You will be a key point of contact for external clients and will work across various internal partner teams with the goal of delivering the firm to this important institutional client segment.Coordinating day-to-day delivery of BlackRock's asset management and associated services, including:Accurate and timely client reportingRegular and ad-hoc data and analytics requests generated by AladdinPreparation for and participation in client market and portfolio reviewsDesign, ownership, and delivery of complex and/or ad hoc client requestsManaging portfolio compliance to client needs and prompt responses to client inquiriesCultivating an awareness of client specific investment and operational priorities and sensitivitiesDeveloping expertise in our client's industry dynamics and trends as well as their specific investment needsLearning fundamentals of insurance financial statements, regulatory and accounting trendsSupporting new business and product development, servicesInitiating and designing client specific solutionsSupporting implementation, including account set up, guideline development and establishing service needsSkills And QualificationsProficiency Off (FTO) so you can relax, recharge and be there for the people you care about.About BlackRockAt BlackRock, we are all connected by one mission: to help more and more people experience financial well-being.
